name: Blood Starved
description: The controls are: WASD or arrow keys to move. K to use energy potion. U to use health potion. O or click to attack (kinda broken). R to select weapon. E to talk to level maiden. Other controls are told in game. Give me suggestions for the game. Cover art not by me, also I am a new game  creator so I don't make the best games, maybe if I can get help I can get better.
